name: House of Eyes
description:
• 3 different endings
  • Hand-drawn backgrounds and character sprites

CREDITS

  • Story, Lineart for Anna & Habibe, Monster Sprite & Design and Backgrounds & Illustrations - GoldieClaws
  • Habibe Halil Tassin, Colour and Shading for Anna & Habibe, and Additional Coding - CandyCornSkull
  • Voice Acting - TabethaMcNealVA
  • Music - Kevin MacLoad
  • Additional Sound Effects - freesound

(Please note - Whilst this game has no blood or gore, the monster itself does have mild body horror elements. Despite the name of the game and possible in-game implications,  there is no visual or mentioned eye trauma.)
